entry.content: Image: Toge Productions Proceeds from this pride-themed bundle benefit the Trevor Project Humble is currently offering a handful of excellent, narrative-driven titles featuring LGBTQ characters in honor of Pride Month. While it might not include games like Hades or Celeste, this $18 still offers an excellent collection of 8 visual novels that put queer characters in the spotlight. Some of the games included in this bundle feature the fantasy-flavored coffee shop simulator Coffee Talk Episode 2...
